path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Shiba Covid Protocol Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeInReward() and _getCurrentSupply() use loops to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list and evaluate total supply respectively. These functions may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Centralized risk
findings.description: The function addLiquidity() sends owner addresses as to parameter. Owner address will acquire the generated LP tokens and after while accumulate a huge portion of LP tokens. It’s unsecure to hold on one centralized address such a significant portion.
